description:
Cody happened to need money to get his car out of the shop. He also happened to be hitch hiking to get home. As a car pulled up, he knew it wasn't going to be a normal ride home.

After feeling the driver's eyes undressing him, Cody knew what direction this car ride would take. Sure enough, after a couple of minutes, the driver asked Cody if he was interested in making some money. Since he needed his car out of the shop ASAP, the muscled stud knew what he had to do.

Sit back, unzip and enjoy yourself as Cody puts on a show, then is serviced by the Canadian hunk JonnyT.
title: A special ride home...
